title: Ep. 233 - Toilet Seat Oppression
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, is it “white nationalism” to expect immigrants to assimilate? No, obviously, but some people think so. Also, a feminist in a college newspaper says that leaving the toilet seat up is patriarchal oppression. And what about the economic argument for abortion? How do we respond to that? Finally, I will address some very angry emails. Date: 04-05-2019
